website_summaries.verdict: Budget-friendly choice with a lightweight, semi-whipped consistency for a youthful finish. Protective formula with SPF 28.
pros: Made with hyaluronic complex and vitamin C with moisturizing elements from Olay
Velvety finish offers full coverage when built accordingly, but won’t settle into fine lines
full-face application takes a couple minutes
cons: Can have a cakey appearance if you don’t have an appropriate blender
Effective soap required to rinse it off

customer_reviews.title: Evens out skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Evens out skin tone, smoothes skin, covers up all the redness and imperfections. See pictures "without" and "with" this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia W.

customer_reviews.title: ... an old lady of 77 It makes me look good. Most important girls itdoesn't cake up even if ...
customer_reviews.text: for being an old lady of 77 It makes me look good. Most important girls itdoesn't cake up even if you sweat. It makes your face smooth and natural. It is simply ageless.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina L Piloto

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND..
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is everything I had hoped for. At 74 had developed "crepey" skin around mouth and under cheeks..the makeup I had only made the creases and wrinkles worse looking/very cakey and unnatural. The covergirl/Olay is wonderful...it does not amplify the wrinkles, crepey skin but helps camoflouge ..I am so happy that i can wear makeup again ....need the overall effect of "even" , smooth skin. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Eureka!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found the foundation I have been searching for! I am 58 years old, and needed to adapt my foundation to the changing landscape of my face (sigh). This foundation comes with a little round sponge applicator and smooths on like a dream. It really evens out skin tone without caking and creasing and generally feeling icky. I took the photo in full sunlight and the heat index here was around 102 today. I live in Houston and am so happy to have found a product that is not only appropriate for my age, but is bearable to wear in our heat. Very, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ehlinger

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and flawless
customer_reviews.text: Cover girl + Olay Simply Ageless Foundation is the best cover up foundation I've ever used. It has a natural matte finish that hides age spots, discolorations, tiny veins and even cat scratches. It's amazing how good my skin looks and feels. I've been using it for about a week, and my skin feels fabulous! Oh, and it stays on all day! Thank you, Covergirl + Olay, for the opportunity to try your great new product! You rock!
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Adamson

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: For years I used Clinique. I gave it up because my aging skin was changing. This goes on smoothly and looks good all day.
customer_reviews.author: Henny Penny

customer_reviews.title: ***NOT CRUELTY FREE****
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving this product one star because I believe there is false advertisement happening here...When you look at the product on Amazon it says cruelty free, however if you scan the barcode on the back of the product it’s NOT cruelty free. The product also does not contain any identification of it being cruelty free. The fact that they have used it for advertising to con people into buying it... If I could give it no stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S. Jollimore

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I find that a little goes a long way. It feels like it’s doing something as soon as I put it on. It seems to diminish the look of wrinkles simply by gliding over them and not seeping in which I had issues with other makeup doing which just enhanced my wrinkles. My face feels firmer. This will be my new foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy K8

customer_reviews.title: This is what my wife received
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this makeup at the end of June, but because it had a seal around it she finished using the makeup she was already using. When she opened the new she found a container of mostly used makeup and a dried up stiff sponge. We are only grading the Covergirl Olay she received, and not the product itself. She loves it, but somebody is a thief and we were the victims. I do not see a return option with this product which causes us to never buy makeup through Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon R Sallee

customer_reviews.title: always with me
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation and have used it for many years. Lately people have been asking me what I use since my skin looks so nice. At 45 I'll take all the help I can get. I've been a cover girl fan since I was a teenager and tried other brands but always come back.
customer_reviews.author: Mraff

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't settle into lines like others do
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried lots of foundations, many much more expensive than this one. It doesn't settle into lines like others do, its not perfect but its the one I use. I'm 64 , and I get compliments all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover, Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over a decade. I’m 65, it covers nicely, doesn’t accumulate in wrinkles. But gives a nice soft cover. Cannot find in stores anymore, I hope they don’t quit making it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I normally use a BB cream. I saw this product recommended in an article and the whole anti aging thing so I decided to try it. I am in my mid 40s, olive skin and i remember using natural beige foundation before. I don't understand the hype at all. The color looks right but when i put it on it looked chalky. It also emphasized my pores and over all, made my skin look quite textured which my skin doesn't look like that without makeup. The Garnier BB Cream does a better job for me and looks natural. Wont buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: cloudshade

customer_reviews.title: Dry and cracked product
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this...dry and cracked. This must be outdated. Do not buy or you will likely be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with first order, no so much with the second purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to order CG & Olay foundation cream. I do love this brand. My first order was fresh and so smooth. It glided on and felt silky, and smooth. It stays on all day, never needing a touch-up. However, I am disappointed in the condition of this recent purchase of CG & Olay foundation. It is cracked and beginning to dry out. Am undecided if I will order online again. Five stars for first order, two for the second....hence 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Foundation!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite foundation so far It doesn't last very long (by that I mean the container itself), but, that's OK because then it never has a chance to get icky. This foundation goes on easily and is not cake-y or obvious. Also, my skin has always been dry, and I am older, so I like the way it goes on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Austin

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Foundation for Mature Skin
customer_reviews.text: I had been using another company's similar product but they have discontinued it so I decided to give this a try. I am quite pleased with COVERGIRL & Olay Simply Ageless Instant Wrinkle Defying Foundation. I checked the colors in the retail store to see which I thought would come closest to matching my skin color. Amazon's price was so much better, I purchased it from here. It's also available in the Subscribe & Save plan so I will be able to save even more. The COVERGIRL & Olay Simply Ageless Instant Wrinkle Defying Foundation is creamy and blends nicely with the included foam sponge. COVERGIRL is not just for your gals anymore.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this foundation. I love the convenience of a cream to apply it and how it seems to dry to a powdery finish. It goes on easy with a sponge, it covers well, wears all day and I'm using it in the worst heat and humidity of Louisiana. It blends well to the skin and truly seems to help diminish the appearance of fine lines. Other foundations seem to sit in top of the skin making wrinkle lines look deeper and this one seems to fill in the fine lines helping them to look much less noticeable. I cannot imagine using any other foundation after discovering this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice foundation
customer_reviews.text: I like this foundation a lot. My skin used to be very oily, not that I'm in my 50's it is much less oily. I used to use a powder foundation but felt it was accentuating my fine lines. This is much better. I do use a foundation brush rather than the sponge applicator it came with. A little goes a long way, coverage is good without having to use too much. I have red areas I've had since birth, told they were pressure spots/points. This foundation covers completely. Also, I feel it helps minimize my fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Good colors for those with skin tones not of the norm
customer_reviews.text: Due to age and genetics I tend to have an odd olive color beige weird complexion color and it's very hard to find a color that works well without being orange, too pale or pink. This works well for that. It's easy to apply and and you can layer it to make it either fairly sheer or for a lot of coverage. The only thing I don't like is it doesn't really absorb much into your skin, so it tends to kind of lay on and really needs to be blended well or it may look splotchy.
customer_reviews.author: Connie B CTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as the reviews state
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews. I don’t have anything negative to say about it except it doesn’t last long. For the price I expected a little more life to it. It’s not bad but nothing I would brag about or recommend. Does go one very smoothly and feels moisturizing. Good for maybe a casual light makeup day
customer_reviews.author: Kari K.

customer_reviews.title: Dry Emphasizes lines not blurs!!
customer_reviews.text: Very dry! I normally use the liquid - this one emphasizes fine lines on me instead of "blurs" - however it does stay on longer than the liquid! Won't buy again. Note! I'm not a powder user! This drys to a powdery finish and any powder is a no go for me it's too drying to my skin! I'm pushing 50 - so I suddenly have extra dry skin. If you are slightly oily t-zone ect you may like this better than the liquid! I did NOT
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Wears Great!  Lasts Long!
customer_reviews.text: My original Covergirl type/shade is almost never on the shelf anymore, so i switched to this Covergirl type that is the same color and I love it. It's great coverage, lasts all thru the day and night and a little goes a long way. Its creamy and smooth. It doesn't make my face look dry even with the powder foundation on top. Ive been a Covergirl Girl for many years. Price is right for a fantastic product. It arrived on time and packaged well. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my age 40 skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m almost 40 and rams good care of my skin. My skin type is dry with some pigmentation and large pours I like to hide. I’m so happy with this product. It goes on smooth and doesn’t flake or crack. It’s moist but not greasy. I use with primer and setting spray and it lasts all day. Coverage is medium. Also a snap to apply with the included sponge. The compact does not include a mirror but had a compartment to hold the sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Made me feel better about Zoom chats.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 73, and didn't realize how bad I looked until I saw myself on the screen. My skin was blotchy and uneven. The Covergirl and Olay product reduced my wrinkles and smoothed out my complexion. I have fair skin, and the Natural Ivory was the perfect shade. The cream includes a soft thing to put it on with, and it went on smoothly. I will use this again, not just for Zoom but whenever I go out. I'm sure I will eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Weird coloring
customer_reviews.text: So this foundation was super weird to me. I may have purchased the wrong color (it’s incredibly positive that I haven’t been paying attention to my tan), but I really felt like the white moisturizer tended to lighten the color on my face. I refused to buy new foundation, so I added in some color corrector and off we went (plus I had my “darker” finishing powder. I’m sure some people love this idea, it’s just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: JenMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation. And I have used some very expensive department store ones
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about 10 years. I have oily skin, am 61 years old and have some spots that are different pigmentation. This foundation gives me a clean, clear coverage without looking heavy. It goes on easily with a sponge. Does not cause breakouts. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup for over 50 skin!
customer_reviews.text: If you get the right color, this is far and away the best make up! It has buildable coverage, but I generally only need one light coat. It gives my skin a beautiful blurred finish that looks very natural. Application is a breeze. Built in sunscreen is very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: This foundation is an absolute “Game Changer!!”
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product!! Used w a great primer your wrinkles, if any cannot be seen & your face is flawless!! I would never use anything else! As a moisturizer/primer I use Marcelle BB Cream in Golden Glow!! The two together make your skin look & feel beautiful!! I am 63 & this has taken 10 years, at least off my look!!!!
customer_reviews.author: suzy tuccillo

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: this is just as great as IT Cosmetics Celebration Foundation, at a fraction of the price :) conceals my red-ish skin on cheeks, chin and between my eyebrows. goes on very easy and silky, blends fabulously, and has a matte finish. since its summer and i have oily skin ... this product has proven very well at keeping my shine down :) i do have to apply a touch of powder later in day but that's the usual for me .. Buy It YOU WILL NOT BE SORRY !
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: 10 STARS
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars is not enough. I have spent years looking for a good foundation. My skin is too dry for powder and I haven't been able to find a liquid that covers well enough and stays on all day because I can't spend $40+ on a bottle of foundation. This stuff is AMAZING. Life changing. Dream come true. It has great coverage, is creamy, isn't shiny, isn't cakey, doesn't dry out my skin, and it lasts ALL DAY. I work 12 hour shifts in all kinds of weather and I don't have to reapply this. Seriously. Will never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Have tried many high end and drugstore brands but this beats them all. Goes on smoothly, doesn’t cake and looks awesome on my ‘kinda’ mature (48 yrs) skin. Buy it - you won’t regret it. I’ve found my new go to foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley G. Lovejoy Grassi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using clinique even better liquid foundation but decided to try this because I love the simply ageless 3 in 1 foundation and use that like a bb or cc cream. I was not disappointed! I love this foundation. It's my favorite of all I've ever used. Goes on smoothly and doesn't sit in the small lines on my face like other foundations do. I bought the simply ageless primer too and that's amazing as well!
customer_reviews.author: Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Go with liquid foundation
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, makes me look older. The liquid foundations are better at hiding pores and brightening skin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great combo Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Great foundation, good coverage, I only apply once in the morning, I use the pad it comes with then blend with a face brush. I like that it is foundation and moisturizer combination. Light on the skin, covers but looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: This Covergirl & Olay Simply Ageless is one of my favorite makeups. Perhaps because it's just so easy - so non-messy with the sponge and I think it goes on so evenly and flawless. No messy liquids or makeup on your hands to apply. Just keep that sponge cleaned and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Great For Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face. I have rosacea and this makeup is the only one that doesn't irritate my skin. I will be buying again. I used to use expensive brands and every one caused irritation. A friend recommended this and it is very easy to apply and covers my rosacea without causing breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and easy
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product. Quick easy to apply. Smooths skin tones and doesn't look fake. I wear it for 12 hours and it doesn't go weird, runny, chuncky through the day. looks the same 7am and 7pm. Washes off easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hanje

customer_reviews.title: Not good with a setting powder
customer_reviews.text: Great for aging skin that needs moisture. Drawback is that it is barely medium coverage. If you hv age spots and uneven pigment it will not cover. Other complaint is it’s meant to use alone for large pores. If you add even the best powder to set it changes the look completely! With powder it shows pores and wrinkles. Transfers to clothing, pillows very easily
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B. Noe

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed. Watery substance and hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: Well, I’m not one to exclaim discontent or complain but, I mean, I don’t know.... Maybe I was expecting something else but this is some of the worst foundation I’ve ever purchased from cover girl. It feels wet, like I’m wiping sweat all over my face & neck. The foundation doesn’t even spread evenly. It’s like impossibly to make this garbage cream look even remote natural or even like I used a mirror when applying. —- thoroughly disappointed for the very first time with CoverGirl products.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It's cool when it goes on
customer_reviews.text: It's cool when it goes on, making it easy to put on in the dark...... I was in south Texas with the relief effort, in a room with other ladies still sleeping. had to put it on in the dark, I could feel where it had been applied, looked great when I got to a mirror. :-)
customer_reviews.author: patsy r. emery

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth, no streaks! Lasts all day! Moisture with no greasy look or feeling!
customer_reviews.text: My mom is 71, has always used the more expensive compact foundation, Elizabeth Arden. I use the cover girl compact and I like that, but when my mom started using this, I noticed how smooth her face looked. When she told me what she was using I almost died! I got on Amazon right away and purchased this make-up! I love it! Lasts all day, goes on very smoothly and really adds moisture without greasiness to my 54 year old face!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Completely dry, broken bag from amazon. Bad service bad product
customer_reviews.text: Completely dry, broken bag from amazon. Bad service bad product
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pansa

customer_reviews.title: THIS MAKEUP IS TRULY AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Wow...This makeup is AMAZING..truly..AMAZING..I have used many different brands through out the years..and I was using Christy Brinkleys brand of make up until it was Sadly discontinued..So I decided to try this brand..and I am Extremely glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie

customer_reviews.title: Beware ordering this from Amazon - dried out.
customer_reviews.text: I do love this product, but will not buy from Amazon again, and instead buy or order from another store. When it arrived, it was so dried out that it was cracked. Not worth the bother of returning, and I tried to use as it was, but it was also not moist on my skin. I waited a while to review, but this stuff is not cheap to me and I wanted to warn others about the Amazon supply being obviously old and dried out.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best at gliding over wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job gliding over wrinkles instead of settling into them. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Yardley Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better than Going to Walmart!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as if it was plucked for the shelf of a department store! Color was exactly correct and package kept it from breaking or cracking the unit. I suggest buying makeup sponges as well to apply the product evenly!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy K. Kimmey

customer_reviews.title: Accented pores
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me. It accented pores. I am in my early 50s with oily T zone and large pores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to makeup. It never lets me down as far as coverage. It doesn’t stay above the fine lines like it promises. But I can handle that. The coverage is just the very best out there. It’s far better than any big name brand cosmetics that cost ten times more!! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: 🌷Whattajewell🌷

customer_reviews.title: Makeup, moisturizer, and sunscreen all in one
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for skin that is normal or on the dry side. Covers slight discolorations, yet does not look like you are wearing makeup. Great choice for those who don't want to fuss. Makeup, moisturizer, and sunscreen all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Executive and Mom

customer_reviews.title: Simply Ageless
customer_reviews.text: When I need fast, even and beautiful coverage this Covergirl Simply Ageless foundation is my absolute go to. Perfect creamy consistency. Easily glides over both my bare skin, and when I go crazy with the moisturizer it doesn't get all caked up. It lasts all day, truly. Heat, humidity, dry air, I run this through the gamut and it's survived. Use a light hand, and this foundation will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Lara

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. It goes on lovely and smooth and doesn't irritate my skin at all. I have sensitive skin and random products will cause me to break out or make my face itch. This foundation has not caused any issues at all. I find that this product covers well without being cakey.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I usually order this product to save me from running to store. I keep one ahead. I'm 62 and always told I look younger than I am. The product is a great quality and comes timely and packed efficiently. I will keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but after reading the reviews decided to give it a try. It went on so smooth, blended easily, and evened out my skin tone wonderfully! I am very happy with it and will continue to use. I have a very fair complexion and the Classic Ivory was just right.
customer_reviews.author: deni_b

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This applies onto skin very smoothly, evenly, and has good coverage over red spots. The color is quite spot on, I am very fair skinned and have a hard time finding the right color for my face. Only issue is that this is very oily, and after a couple hours my face is very shinny/oily. I need to keep applying powder through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Kinzzz

customer_reviews.title: Nice for u younger skin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but I find that it sits in my fine lines and wrinkles. To be fair, my skin is naturally dry so I need to be careful when purchasing any foundations. It does cover well. My 28 yr old daughter loved it so I would highly recommend it for younger women.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: cumbersome packaging, good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it but wish it had a mirror since it is made like a compact...i like it...true to color and blends well, doesnt settle in lines or wrinkles...can build coverage...i don't love the way it's packaged but it's okay...i do like the product itself however.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl brown

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm 71 and have wrinkles and spots to hide. This product does that pretty well without getting into the wrinkles and making them look worse. I've tried all kinds of cover-ups, etc., but I like this one. Go a shade darker than you ordinarily would.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ams

customer_reviews.title: GREAT NATURAL LOOKING FOUNDATION
customer_reviews.text: I found this product because eve though I am kind of oily, my nose gets really dry and it looks like it’s pilling, I read the amazing reviews and I could not agree more with them. This product is like a cream/pomade that I apply with my fingers to warm it up and then blend it on my skin with either a brush or a sponge. This is great for an everyday foundation. It covers and evens out skin tone in the most natural way! LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Hello Big Pores
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. Makes my pores look HUGE. It magnifies them.
customer_reviews.author: Boho Girl

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best foundations I've ever used for its price! It glides on smoothing my skin and with a very good coverage without weighing down. The only problem is that the classic beige it's a bit too light for my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Cristiane Ripari Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: and although a great foundation it is comparable to other products
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years, and although a great foundation it is comparable to other products. The key for me is the packaging. I always have my makeup sponge available and a spot to keep it. Funny how it's the small stuff but it's true. Then I just use one shade darker to do the contouring.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMae

customer_reviews.title: Age spots...where?
customer_reviews.text: probably my absolute favorite makeup I've bought. The coverage is not cakey and doesn't highlight your pores. This goes on very smooth and the coverage is great without looking like you plastered your face with paint. Especially for women who are seeing more age spots and freckles this coverage is subtle but concealing. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. P

customer_reviews.title: Sad to say I was not happy with this make up
customer_reviews.text: OK I don’t like when I have to give a poor review but I have to say this make up made my pores and wrinkles look 10 times worse and this is just my honest opinion I’m sorry I know you can’t completely cover your wrinkles and make up things into them I’m well aware of it but this definitely made me look worse than any other make up I’ve tried
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use a make-up product to pan. I have a lot of make-up. But this product was great. I used it every day for months. It worked great on my skin. I used this product mainly in the winter when my skin was dryer. It did not cake up. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Swindell

customer_reviews.title: FRESH LOOKING FACE HOURS LATER
customer_reviews.text: This foundation goes on very smoothly and then stays where you put it for hours. If you are going to be in the sun for an extended period of time you may want to use sunscreen under it. I use sunscreen under it to keep scars on my neck from getting darker. The make-up is not changed by the sunscreen underneath.
customer_reviews.author: stillclickin'

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup and coverage
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best makeup I have found as far as coverage and does not cause break outs. Also has sunblock in it, as most makeups don't, which is very important. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Great make up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great make up. It does not feel heavy does not run or make your face feel hot or sweaty. Does not irritation your face and the color is just as it looks. I have tried many others but tried this when it came out and have never tried anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not a good anti aging product for women in their sixties. With or without the primer this foundation still settles into lines. I purchased this based on the hype & great reviews, but it isn't for me. This particular shade is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Chilly

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks dry and wrinkles more pronounced!
customer_reviews.text: I applied this to half my face and the color choice was fine but my wrinkles were more prominent and skin looked very dry and old on the side with the foundation. I certainly did not get the expected "youthful glow:! I shall continue to use Oil of Olay for skin care and forget about this specific product ....which I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: consumer1000000000

customer_reviews.title: natural Look
customer_reviews.text: Never tried this product before until now. Absolutely love it, great coverage, color perfect for my skin. the texture is most important, just the right mix , very impressed . I'm hooked. Yes, I am a senior, this is perfect for us beautiful older women.
customer_reviews.author: CARON HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman over the age of 60 and believe me, this foundation is fantastic for mature skin. It does not add to wrinkles and make them look worst. It glides on, covers flaws very good, and does not enhance line areas. You look natural after using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit messy
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding the right color. After I apply, I notice it can be streaky and need a touch up. Unlike other foundations though, it doesn't sit in my wrinkles and bring attention to them. It doesn't dry out my skin or make it feel tight. It take a bit to clean my face and make sure it is all off at night though. Also leaves residue everywhere. Make sure you don't touch your face after you apply and wash your hands many times a day. If not, you will leave a trail of makeup prints everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Really good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love this...foundation has full coverage!! Stays on! I will buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Jennkizblessed

customer_reviews.title: Covers every blemish and moisturizing. Fills in wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for skin moisture and concealing for the entire face. I apply it with a foundation brush. My skin gets a little oily so I add a little powder on my nose and forehead after applying because you get a lot of moisture with this foundatuon.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Angele Matt

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt use anything else
customer_reviews.text: GREAT coverage without settling in fine lines. Doesn't break me out Best I've ever used and I've tried alot of expensive brands
customer_reviews.author: April Masters

customer_reviews.title: Please don't ever discontinue this!
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty and not too heavy, doesn't make skin look dry. But covers well.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: This is so great and makes my skin look awesome as it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for quite some time. My skin changed at my current age so I needed to get rid of the powder products. This is so great and makes my skin look awesome as it is non drying and stays fresh looking all day. I get nervous when I can't find it in the stores. When I do find the prices are outrageous. Hopefully CoverGirl won't discontinue a Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ncfancy

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage without feeling heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite fast and easy foundation. You dinner get a lot for the price, but I use it when I want to get my face done fast. Color blended well and it doesn't feel heavy at all. I will order again
customer_reviews.author: CHaas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation on the market. It goes on smooth and moisturizes! You can add more if you want better coverage. No flaking or balling of the product on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my order
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Some people complain that it dries out, so the lid has to be kept on tightly. That's why it's so darned hard to open when you first get it. If it starts to dry out, simply run it under the tap briefly. Turn it so most of the water runs off. There should be water droplets clinging to the product. Put the cap on tightly, and let it sit for a couple of day. Voila, good as new. If it's really really dry, you might have to do this two times. I had no problem with my order whatsoever, unlike three of the other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: SheSellsSeashells

customer_reviews.title: Great value, super great product. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Love the value and paying a fraction of what I'm used to spending on high end make up. Not only that it's a great product. Switched all my old line for this one. Love savings and love the product.
customer_reviews.author: WNWR2019

customer_reviews.title: I love this makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup. It covers perfectly and you only need to apply once during the day. Perfect colors for your skin tone. I can switch between a lighter one in the summer and a darker in the winter. I really love this product. Awesome price as well.
customer_reviews.author: LVALDI777

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's not BAD but it's definitely not something I'll buy again. It's too cakey for me. I don't have bad skin and I don't need this much on my face. It's also like powdery dry feeling almost? Idk it's hard to explain. I'd rather use a liquid.
customer_reviews.author: ErinG

customer_reviews.title: Oh twist to open!
customer_reviews.text: I'm rushing to get ready for a dinner date. I pull out my new Cover Girl product. Got the applicator. But could not open the rest of the pretty plastic clam shell. Days later I find, in small print, the words twist to open. The coverage is great and the color is what was expected.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleReign

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage, natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the rest, always came back to the best. This makeup provides excellent coverage that is incredibly natural looking. Most people have told me I look as if I'm not wearing any foundation at all, yet tell me my skin looks beautiful. It is so easy to apply, takes seconds and you are done. And the price is right. Stop spending a lot on foundation and try CoverGirl Simply Ageless in compact form. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca w.

customer_reviews.title: this product works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Covergirl & Olay Simply Ageless Instant Wrinkle Defying Foundation for a year then tried other brands of the same type of foundations and have returned to this one. It out preformed the rest in not emphasizing my wrinkles. The color match is perfect. It does not feel heavy on my skin,and coverage lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: azdreeemr

customer_reviews.title: It's my go to for now
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. It does cake in the wrinkles though. But for the rest of the skin (when your skin isn't dry) it looks decent once it sets after an hour or so. But yeah don't use on dry cracked skin, idk why they say it moisturizes. And the price is kind've too high so I try to not use a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this product for 10 years and paying $15 to $16 for each unit. Occasionally she would find a $3 coupon, whippy! She now buys it here, the same product, fresh and priced well below the big box store and no coupons to fool with. You can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: SEARCHED A LONG TIME FOR THIS MAKEUP
customer_reviews.text: I really like this makeup - light, nongreasy, covers well, quickly & easily - but why no applicator? Even so, makeup still merits 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lee Gay Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Covers great, goes on smoothly over moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best. Works best when preceded by my Oil of Olay moisturizer. Covers GREAT, really lasts all day. I have it on subscription! It's a much better value on Amazon than what I was paying in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Knox

customer_reviews.title: User for years
customer_reviews.text: The best foundation for woman over 40. East to apply, nice skin tone match. Been using it forever now. It really does hide wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good for purse and travel bags
customer_reviews.text: I love this line of cosmetics a from Covergirl. Hadn't tried this one. Love it too, and love that I can keep this in my purse for touch ups, and in my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wish there was more in the container.
customer_reviews.text: There is so very little and runs out quickly. It covers well for old skin and that is what I needed, products that don’t make me look wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lin

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite foundation. The coverage is insane, and does not cause oily skin. I barely need to use my concealer now that I have this foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Flawless finish.  Full coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love this product as it provides flawless, full coverage. Have never experienced any caking or clumping. looks natural and easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: LB12

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing, great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and very moisturizing. I have extremely dry skin and this covered those areas without looking cakey or cracking. I also use the foundation version and this covers just as well if not better!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi P

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I'm an older lady and am suddenly plagued by brown age spots on my face as well as elsewhere. This is the absolutely best product I've discovered in terms of even coverage. The addition of Olay moistureizer makes it even better. I use the soft honey shade inasmuch as I live in Florida and am tan most of the year.
customer_reviews.author: coryrealtor

customer_reviews.title: Give this a try its  worth it  !!
customer_reviews.text: so far I love it !! Its kind full coverage but doesn't get into fine lines ..im 42 and have a hard time with dry skin but it do't seem to mess with the makeup . Feels good on my face as well. So I give it 5 stars would go to 10 if they had that option 😏
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Moore

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was very dry and thick, it wasn't easy to apply. It wasn't quite my complexion, but I mixed it with a different liquid foundation and it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Covergirl & Olay Simply Ageless Instant Wrinkle-Defying Foundation, Buff Beige
product_meta.description:
Color:225 BUFF BEIGEKeep them guessing your age with Covergirl Simply Ageless Instant Wrinkle-Defying Foundation. The #1 anti-aging foundation glides over fine lines and wrinkles to diminish their appearance and deliver a youthful-looking glow. Skin looks healthier and more hydrated thanks to the formula with hyaluronic complex and vitamin C, and it contains SPF 28 for protection from sun damage. Pro-tip: Use with Covergirl Simply Ageless Anti-Aging Foundation Primer for maximum results.

BRAND STORY
By CoverGirl
feature_bullets: YOUNGER-LOOKING SKIN: This anti-aging foundation diminishes the look of fine lines and wrinkles for a more youthful glow
HYDRATING FORMULA: Contains hyaluronic complex and vitamin C for healthier-looking skin
SAFE IN THE SUN: With SPF 28, this foundation helps protect skin from sun damage
FIND YOUR SHADE: Available in multiple shades for you to find the right match for your skin tone
CRUELTY-FREE: Covergirl products are Leaping Bunny Certified by Cruelty-Free International, meaning they are never tested on animals

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
